mapper.update: update RIDINGBOARD set TITLE=#{title}, MLOCA=#{mloca}, MTIME=#{mtime}, MDAY=#{mday}, DISTANCE=#{distance}, TIME=#{time}, PNUM=#{pnum}, PH=#{ph} where BNO=#{bno}
mapper.select: select b.BNO,b.TITLE,b.MLOCA,b.MTIME,b.MDAY,b.DISTANCE,b.TIME, b.PNUM,b.PH,b.CDT,b.RBTYPE,b.MNO,b.LOCA,m.MNM from RIDINGBOARD b inner join MEMBERS m on b.mno=m.mno where BNO=#{no}
select AB,BB from MAP where BNO=#{no}
select * from RIDINGBOARD order by BNO desc limit #{no}
mapper.delete: delete from MEMBERLIST where BNO=#{bno} and MNO=#{mno}
